Text: ICAPWG Jan Mtg AgendaAt the ICAP Working Group Chair Matthew Picardis request I attach the agenda for the ICAP Working Group meeting on Thursday January beginning at am at the NYISO office at Washington Avenue Extension Albany Meeting materials have been posted on the NYISO website under ServicesCommittees Working GroupsBusiness Issues CommitteeInstalled Capacity ICAP Working GroupMeeting Materials This agenda will be posted there as well Please call Matthew Picardi John Charlton at the NYISO or me if you have any questions See you Thursday Kathy Robb Hunton Williams Agenda for January ICAPWG MeetingvDOC Agenda for January ICAPWG MeetingvDOC You are currently subscribed to nyisotie as ESENRONCOM To unsubscribe send a blank email to

WILL BE BY PHONE ByLaws Governance Subcommittee Meeting Feb The ByLaws Governance Subcommittee meeting scheduled for Thursday Feb WILL BE HELD BY CONFERENCE CALL ONLY The dialin number originally set up for call in to the meeting will be used for the conference call Here again is the dialin information for the ByLaws meeting on Feb Dialin Number Conference ID Moderator Name Kathy Robb Materials for the meeting have been posted on the website If you have any questions please call Peter Brown the Chair of the Bylaws Governance Subcommittee or me Many thanks Kathy Robb Hunton Williams You are currently subscribed to nyisotie as To unsubscribe send a blank email to

Draft ICAP WG AGENDA FOR OCt Robb Kathy writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Here is a draft agenda for the October meeting of the ICAP Working Group Please forward any additional items to me before pm tomorrow Many thanks Kathy Robb Introductions and review agenda Carl Data approved Timeline approved SCR discussion verification metering information reporting operating data Report on Externals DMNC Test Reporting OPP length group discussion New Business Adjourn

RE Sept ICAPWG MtgRobb Kathy writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List A reminder that all papers or materials for presentations at the September th ICAP Working Group meeting must be circulated no later than Thursday morning September If you have not done so please let me know if you are planning on speaking Many thanks Original Message From Robb Kathy mailto Sent Friday September PM To Subject Sept ICAPWG Mtg Robb Kathy writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List The next ICAP Working Group meeting will be held on Monday September beginning at am at the NYS Nurses Association Cornell Road Latham NY The agenda is to hear presentations about and discuss ICAP theological issues originally scheduled for the Sept meeting that was cancelled Presentations at the meeting will be limited to minutes All those interested in presenting should circulate materials to the tech exchange no later than the morning of Thursday September Please let me know if you are planning on presenting an issue as soon as possible so we can structure the order of presentations If you have any questions please contact Howard Fromer chair of the ICAP Working Group John Charlton at the NYISO or me Kathy Robb

RE Sept ICAPWG MtgRevised Norman Mah materialsRobb Kathy writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Joe I am sure Mr Mah would be happy to discuss among many other ICAP issues further with you at the ICAP Working Group meeting on Monday Original Message From Kirkpatrick Joe mailto Sent Friday September AM To Subject RE Sept ICAPWG MtgRevised Norman Mah materials Kirkpatrick Joe writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List for OM I am not sure how in the world this can be considered a typical example Where are the taxes Where are the interest payments Return on Investment If the objective is to grossly misrepresent the cost of a GT then this is a typical example Original Message From Robb Kathy mailto Sent Friday September AM To Subject FW Sept ICAPWG MtgRevised Norman Mah materials Attached is a revised presentation from Norman Mah for the Sept ICAP Working Group meeting The presentation is three pages long The change made in this version is on page the OM number has been lowered to from the previous version in response to comments received by Mr Mah Otherwise the presentation mirrors the one previously circulated Benefits of ICAPppt

FW Material for ICAPWG Sept Meeting Agenda Item Robb Kathy writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Enclosed for discussion are draft modifications to the ICAP Manual to conform the ICAP Manual sections regarding Control Area System Resources with those sections of the ICAP Manual governing the qualification of Generators Earlier this summer the ICAPWG informally requested the NYISO Staff and a few members of the ICAPWG to prepare and propose such modifications John Charlton will present these documents for discussion at the ICAPWG meeting under item of the Agenda Discussion of ICAP Developments CLEAN PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS TO ICAP MANUAL FOR pdf BLACKLINED PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS TO ICAP MANUAL FOR pdf CLEAN PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS TO ICAP MANUAL FOR BLACKLINED PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS TO ICAP MANUAL FOR

ICAPWG September MTG CANCELLED Cc Robb Kathy writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List A reminder that the September ICAPWG meeting has been cancelled The September meeting will go forward Original Message From Robb Kathy Sent Sunday August AM To Subject ICAPWG Aug MTG CANCELLED Howard Fromer chair of the ICAP Working Group has asked that we cancel the ICAP Working Group meeting scheduled for next Tuesday August because it conflicts with the RTO mediation which he and others involved in the ICAP Working Group are attending In addition the Tuesday September meeting is cancelled and will be rescheduled for some time in September that does not conflict with the RTO effort If you have any questions please contact John Charlton at the NYISO Howard Fromer or me Many thanks Kathy Robb Hunton WIlliams

November ICAPWG Meeting Cancelled Cc The ICAP Working Group meeting originally scheduled for this Friday November in Albany has been cancelled The issues that some members of the Working Group had identified for the agenda are not yet ripe for discussion Thanks Kathy Robb Hunton Williams

Sept ICAPWG MtgRobb Kathy writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List The next ICAP Working Group meeting will be held on Monday September beginning at am at the NYS Nurses Association Cornell Road Latham NY The agenda is to hear presentations about and discuss ICAP theological issues originally scheduled for the Sept meeting that was cancelled Presentations at the meeting will be limited to minutes All those interested in presenting should circulate materials to the tech exchange no later than the morning of Thursday September Please let me know if you are planning on presenting an issue as soon as possible so we can structure the order of presentations If you have any questions please contact Howard Fromer chair of the ICAP Working Group John Charlton at the NYISO or me Kathy Robb

ICAPWG September MTG CANCELLED Cc Robb Kathy writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List A reminder that the September ICAPWG meeting has been cancelled The September meeting will go forward Original Message From Robb Kathy Sent Sunday August AM To Subject ICAPWG Aug MTG CANCELLED Howard Fromer chair of the ICAP Working Group has asked that we cancel the ICAP Working Group meeting scheduled for next Tuesday August because it conflicts with the RTO mediation which he and others involved in the ICAP Working Group are attending In addition the Tuesday September meeting is cancelled and will be rescheduled for some time in September that does not conflict with the RTO effort If you have any questions please contact John Charlton at the NYISO Howard Fromer or me Many thanks Kathy Robb Hunton WIlliams

Stage Manual Addl changesAttached are a few changed pages of the Stage ICAP Manual to be approved at the July BIC meeting All these changes were made as result of ICAP Working Group deliberations over the past two weeks They are summarized here Section This new subsection addresses Generators that temporarily may not wish to sell or certify their UCAP Without this language those Generators would have been considered forced out Section The second paragraph is new and clarifies the result of outages which occur beyond the stepup transformer and including such stepup transformer If these outages occur at a time when a Generator has not placed its unit on a maintenance outage such interruption in availability shall be treated as a reserve shutdown for purposes of calculating that Generators EFORD Section Language describing the rollover characteristics of UCAP bids from the first phase of an auction to the second phase of that same auction has been struck because the ICAPWG deemed it confusing In addition a motion for approval of the Stage ICAP Manual including these additional changes is attached If you have questions please contact John Charlton at the NYISO Howard Fromer chair of the ICAPWG or me Kathy Robb Hunton Williams BIC Motion to approve Stage Manualvpdf Redpdf Redpdf redPDF BIC Motion to approve Stage Manualvpdf Redpdf Redpdf redPDF
